name: Round the World
description:
This Game is for Android! :)

In Round the World, as one of the last of the scavengers, you must travel around a dying planet collecting gold coins. Your highest score will be placed in a leaderboard against the other remaining scavengers, do you have what it takes?

Includes:
*An easy-feel, easy-to-run minimalistic tone.

*Optimised for the user, and your phone.

*Optional Competitive Gameplay: Can you be the best scavenger of the dying worlds? Try and beat your friends and fellow scavengers with your highscore!

*A happy soundtrack to ease that bad day!

*All inclusive Free download! (Because pay-to-win sucks!)

*Made by gamers, for gamers.

______________________
How to play:

Its simple! 'Round the World relies on you to control the player using the swipes and drags of your finger to steer him away from craters!

What are your waiting for?

A world full of danger awaits you...
